titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 1) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the programs of the National Institutes of Health, and for other purposes, and against consideration of such conference report.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-101, by Ms. Slaughter.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 1. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 43.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 1 (amending the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend programs of the National Institutes of Health).
